医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
从实验室到工厂：在 James Mencel 博士的指导下扩大 API 工艺在本次采访中，NewsMed 讨论了 James Mencel 博士关于扩大 API 流程的指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Lab-to-plant-Scaling-up-API-processes-with-Dr-James-Mencels-guidance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Lab-to-plant-Scaling-up-API-processes-with-Dr-James-Mencels-guidance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2f6fe27-6106-4ad6-80c6-adbb523ed93a Mon, 06 May 2024 11:40:00 -0400 Lab to plant: Scaling up API processes with Dr. James Mencel's guidance
2 型糖尿病管理与血糖控制的营养干预研究人员探索健康饮食干预对各种体重和心脏代谢参数的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Nutritional-interventions-for-type-2-diabetes-management-with-glycemic-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Nutritional-interventions-for-type-2-diabetes-management-with-glycemic-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=662332c1-af40-4cb3-9029-c15adc51a7ff Mon, 06 May 2024 11:17:00 -0400 Nutritional interventions for type 2 diabetes management with glycemic control
研究人员回顾了有关耳念珠菌（一种新兴的多重耐药酵母）的当前证据研究人员讨论了耳念珠菌（一种新兴的多重耐药酵母）的当前证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Researchers-review-current-evidence-on-Candida-aurisc2a0an-emerging-multidrug-pressive-yeast.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Researchers-review-current-evidence-on-Candida-aurisc2a0an-emerging-multidrug-pressive-yeast.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0484608b-0ef9-4fb8-a74a-87f46ccb82d8 Mon, 06 May 2024 10:56:00 -0400 Researchers review current evidence on Candida auris, an emerging multidrug-resistant yeast
个性化筛查方法可以更好地预测妊娠前三个月的先兆子痫根据今天发表在《高血压》杂志上的一项新研究，一种新的子痫前期筛查算法结合了母亲病史、超声数据和多项血液标记物测试，可以更好地预测妊娠前三个月的大多数子痫前期病例，而此时子痫前期病例仍然是可以预防的。美国心脏协会杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Personalized-screening-approach-may-better-predict-preeclampsia-in-the-first-trimester-of-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Personalized-screening-approach-may-better-predict-preeclampsia-in-the-first-trimester-of-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9acf39e9-c4db-4e2f-98e1-0ceb4d0a70fc Mon, 06 May 2024 08:16:59 -0400 Personalized screening approach may better predict preeclampsia in the first trimester of pregnancy
持久的淋巴结扩张改善了针对肿瘤的疫苗反应我们每个人都有大约 600 个淋巴结 (LN)，这是一种豆状的小器官，容纳各种类型的血细胞并过滤淋巴液，散布在我们的全身。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Durable-lymph-node-expansion-improves-vaccine-responses-against-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Durable-lymph-node-expansion-improves-vaccine-responses-against-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05b51620-1745-4090-90f1-71af7856522f Mon, 06 May 2024 07:59:00 -0400 Durable lymph-node expansion improves vaccine responses against tumors
研究确定了人脑中的神经罗盘发表在《自然·人类行为》杂志上的一项新研究发现了一种有助于防止我们迷路的大脑活动模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-identizes-neural-compass-in-the- human-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-identizes-neural-compass-in-the- human-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5d1f613-5f0b-408c-a481-2f58b0cac7e5 Mon, 06 May 2024 07:25:49 -0400 Study identifies neural compass in the human brain
诊断后植物性饮食模式与前列腺癌进展风险之间有何关联？前列腺癌进展风险与植物性饮食依从性之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/What-is-the-association- Between-post-diagnostic-plant-based-dietary-patterns-and-the-risk-of-prostate-cancer-进展.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/What-is-the-association- Between-post-diagnostic-plant-based-dietary-patterns-and-the-risk-of-prostate-cancer- Progress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37810c8f-8534-410f-931b-249fde1d43ec Mon, 06 May 2024 07:13:00 -0400 What is the association between post-diagnostic plant-based dietary patterns and the risk of prostate cancer progression?
老年人被困在急诊室等待医院护理并遭受本可避免的伤害美国各地的医院每天都会上演这样的场景：老年男女躺在急诊室走廊的轮床上，默默地呻吟或承受痛苦，而忙碌的医务人员则在处理危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Stranded-in-the-ER-seniors-await-hospital-care-and-suffer-avoidable-harm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Stranded-in-the-ER-seniors-await-hospital-care-and-suffer-avoidable-harm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a473205-8b77-4692-8736-7e3b876f2c7d Mon, 06 May 2024 06:51:37 -0400 Stranded in the ER, seniors await hospital care and suffer avoidable harm
更好的吸入器可以帮助患者和地球吗？波士顿布莱根妇女医院的肺部专家米格尔·迪沃 (Miguel Divo) 坐在检查室里，对面坐着患有哮喘的乔尔·鲁宾斯坦 (Joel Rubinstein)。鲁宾斯坦是一位退休的精神科医生，他即将接受检查，并听到了令人惊讶的宣传——为了地球，也为了他的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Could-better-inhalers-help-病人-and-the-planet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Could-better-inhalers-help-病人-and-the-planet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a768deea-1a07-4d47-b4e3-23237bbbacd0 Mon, 06 May 2024 06:50:18 -0400 Could better inhalers help patients, and the planet?
通过基于手机的应用程序监测和鼓励身体活动能否改善 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖控制和体重减轻？用于维护个人健康记录的智能手机应用程序 (app) 是否鼓励身体活动、改善步数和血糖控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Can-monitoring-and-encouraging-physical-activity-through-phone-based-apps-improve-glycemic-control-and-weight-loss-in- 2 型糖尿病患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Can-monitoring-and-encouraging-physical-activity-through-phone-based-apps-improve-glycemic-control-and-weight-loss-in- 2 型糖尿病患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da16dbae-e16c-45ba-b20b-a4db3e4e63d5 Mon, 06 May 2024 06:29:00 -0400 Can monitoring and encouraging physical activity through phone-based apps improve glycemic control and weight loss in type 2 diabetes patients?
